net.floodlightcontroller.routing

接口 IRoutingService

  • 所有超级接口:
    IFloodlightService
    所有已知实现类:
    TopologyManager

    public interface IRoutingService
extends IFloodlightService

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie)
      Provides a route between src and dst that allows tunnels.
      Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie, boolean tunnelEnabled)
      Provides a route between src and dst, with option to allow or not allow tunnels in the path.
      Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId srcId, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort srcPort, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dstId, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort dstPort, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie)
      Provides a route between srcPort on src and dstPort on dst.
      Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId srcId, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort srcPort, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dstId, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort dstPort, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie, boolean tunnelEnabled)
      Provides a route between srcPort on src and dstPort on dst.
      java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId longSrcDpid, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId longDstDpid, boolean tunnelEnabled)
      return all routes, if available
      boolean routeExists(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst)
      Check if a route exists between src and dst, including tunnel links in the path.
      boolean routeExists(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst, boolean tunnelEnabled)
      Check if a route exists between src and dst, with option to have or not have tunnels as part of the path.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRoute

        Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie)
        Provides a route between src and dst that allows tunnels. The cookie is provisioned for callers of getRoute to provide additional information to influence the route to be returned, if the underlying routing implementation supports choice among multiple routes.
        参数:
        src - Source switch DPID.
        dst - Destination switch DPID.
        cookie - cookie (usage determined by implementation; ignored by topology instance now).

      • getRoute

        Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie,
             boolean tunnelEnabled)
        Provides a route between src and dst, with option to allow or not allow tunnels in the path.
        参数:
        src - Source switch DPID.
        dst - Destination switch DPID.
        cookie - cookie (usage determined by implementation; ignored by topology instance now).
        tunnelEnabled - boolean option.

      • getRoute

        Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId srcId,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort srcPort,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dstId,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort dstPort,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie)
        Provides a route between srcPort on src and dstPort on dst.
        参数:
        src - Source switch DPID.
        srcPort - Source port on source switch.
        dst - Destination switch DPID.
        dstPort - dstPort on Destination switch.
        cookie - cookie (usage determined by implementation; ignored by topology instance now).

      • getRoute

        Route getRoute(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId srcId,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort srcPort,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dstId,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort dstPort,
             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie,
             boolean tunnelEnabled)
        Provides a route between srcPort on src and dstPort on dst.
        参数:
        src - Source switch DPID.
        srcPort - Source port on source switch.
        dst - Destination switch DPID.
        dstPort - dstPort on Destination switch.
        cookie - cookie (usage determined by implementation; ignored by topology instance now).
        tunnelEnabled - boolean option.

      • getRoutes

        java.util.ArrayList<Route> getRoutes(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId longSrcDpid,
                                   org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId longDstDpid,
                                   boolean tunnelEnabled)
        return all routes, if available

      • routeExists

        boolean routeExists(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst)
        Check if a route exists between src and dst, including tunnel links in the path.

      • routeExists

        boolean routeExists(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId src,
                  org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId dst,
                  boolean tunnelEnabled)
        Check if a route exists between src and dst, with option to have or not have tunnels as part of the path.
